ygData.subject: Re: Unit 37 / Astrotrain
ygData.msgSnippet: One of the Council members stands up. No not here. Come with me to the retaining cells. he commands. Reflector follows behind. Spinister continues to follow

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

One of the Council members stands up. "No not here. Come with me to the
retaining cells." he commands. Reflector follows behind.

Spinister continues to follow Havotron, deep in thought about what is
going on.
